content:
+ kartthaavinre bahumaanam thalsthaanatthu ennekkum vaazhtthappettathaakunnu.
+ kartthaavin്re bahu maanam thalsthaanatthu ennekkum vaazhtthappettathaakunnu.
+ kartthaavin്re bahumaanam thalsthaanatthu enne nnekkum vaazhtthappettathaakunnu.

Vishuddhiyum mahatthuvavumulla thrithvame! Njangalotu karuna cheyyaname.
Vishuddhiyum mahatthuvavumulla thrithvame! Njangalotu karuna cheyyaname.
Vishuddhiyum mahatthuvavu mulla thrithvame! Krupayundaayi njangalotu karuna cheyyaname.

Nee ennekkum vishuddhiyum mahatthuvavumullavanaa kunnu.
Nee ennekkum vishuddhiyum mahatthuvavumullavanaa kunnu.
Nee ennennekkum vishuddhiyum mahatthuvavumullavanum nin്re thirunaamam vaazhtthappettathumaakunnu.

Njangalute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi.
Njanga lute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi.
Ennekkum njangalute sharanavume! Ninakku sthuthi.
